00037 typedef CstrHashMap<int> CountMap;
00038 
00039 struct GcWorker {
00040   GcWorker(TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs, int interval,
00041            bool dryrun = false) : m_metadata(metadata),
00042            m_fs(fs), m_interval(interval), m_dryrun(dryrun) {}
00043 
00044   TablePtr     &m_metadata;
00045   Filesystem   *m_fs;
00046   int           m_interval;
00047   bool          m_dryrun;
00048 
00049   void
00050   scan_metadata(CountMap &files_map) {
00051     TableScannerPtr scanner;
00052     ScanSpec scan_spec;
00053 
00054     scan_spec.columns.clear();
00055     scan_spec.columns.push_back("Files");
00056 
00057     scanner = m_metadata->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00058 
00059     TableMutatorPtr mutator = m_metadata->create_mutator();
00060 
00061     Cell cell;
00062     string last_row;
00063     string last_cq;
00064     uint64_t last_time = 0;
00065     bool found_valid_files = true;
00066 
00067     HT_DEBUG("MasterGc: scanning metadata...");
00068 
00069     while (scanner->next(cell)) {
00070       if (strcmp("Files", cell.column_family)) {
00071         HT_ERRORF("Unexpected column family '%s', while scanning METADATA",
00072                   cell.column_family);
00073         continue;
00074       }
00075       if (last_row != cell.row_key) {
00076         // new row
00077         if (!found_valid_files)
00078           delete_row(last_row, mutator);
00079 
00080         last_row = cell.row_key;
00081         last_time = cell.timestamp;
00082         found_valid_files = *cell.value != '!';
00083 
00084         if (found_valid_files)
00085           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len, 1);
00086       }
00087       else if (last_cq != cell.column_qualifier) {
00088         // new access group
00089         last_cq = cell.column_qualifier;
00090         last_time = cell.timestamp;
00091         int is_valid_files = *cell.value != '!';
00092         found_valid_files |= is_valid_files;
00093 
00094         if (is_valid_files)
00095           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len, 1);
00096       }
00097       else {
00098         if (cell.timestamp > last_time) {
00099           HT_ERROR("Unexpected timestamp order while scanning METADATA");
00100           continue;
00101         }
00102         if (*cell.value != '!') {
00103           insert_files(files_map, (char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00104           delete_cell(cell, mutator);
00105         }
00106       }
00107     }
00108     // for last table
00109     if (!found_valid_files)
00110       delete_row(last_row, mutator);
00111 
00112     mutator->flush();
00113   }
00114 
00115   void
00116   delete_row(const string &row, TableMutatorPtr &mutator) {
00117     if (row.empty())
00118       return;
00119 
00120     KeySpec key(row);
00121 
00122     HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: Deleting row %s", (char *)key.row);
00123 
00124     if (!m_dryrun)
00125       mutator->set_delete(0, key);
00126   }
00127 
00128   void
00129   delete_cell(const Cell &cell, TableMutatorPtr &mutator) {
00130     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"MasterGc: Deleting cell: ("<< cell.row_key <<", "
00131                  << cell.column_family <<", "<< cell.column_qualifier <<", "
00132                  << cell.timestamp <<')'<< HT_END;
00133 
00134     KeySpec key(cell.row_key, cell.column_family, cell.column_qualifier);
00135 
00136     if (!m_dryrun)
00137       mutator->set_delete(cell.timestamp, key);
00138   }
00139 
00140   void
00141   insert_files(CountMap &map, const char *buf, size_t len, int c = 0) {
00142     const char *p = buf, *pn = p, *endp = p + len - 1;
00143 
00144     while (p < endp) {
00145       while (p < endp && (*p != ';' ||  p[1] != '\n'))
00146         ++p;
00147 
00148       if (p == endp)
00149         break;
00150 
00151       string name(pn, p - pn);
00152       p += 2;
00153       insert_file(map, name.c_str(), c);
00154       pn = p;
00155     }
00156   }
00157 
00158   void
00159   insert_file(CountMap &map, const char *fname, int c) {
00160     if (*fname == '#')
00161       ++fname;
00162 
00163     CountMap::InsRet ret = map.insert(fname, c);
00164 
00165     if (!ret.second)
00166       (*ret.first).second += c;
00167   }
00168 
00174   void
00175   reap(CountMap &files_map) {
00176     size_t nf = 0, nf_done = 0, nd = 0, nd_done = 0;
00177     CountMap dirs_map; // reap empty range directories as well
00178 
00179     foreach (const CountMap::value_type &v, files_map) {
00180       if (!v.second) {
00181         HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removing file %s", v.first);
00182 
00183         if (!m_dryrun) {
00184           try {
00185             m_fs->remove(v.first);
00186             ++nf_done;
00187           }
00188           catch (Exception &e) {
00189             HT_ERRORF("%s", e.what());
00190           }
00191         }
00192         ++nf;
00193       }
00194       char *p = strrchr(v.first, '/');
00195 
00196       if (p) {
00197         string dir_name(v.first, p - v.first);
00198         insert_file(dirs_map, dir_name.c_str(), v.second);
00199       }
00200     }
00201     foreach (const CountMap::value_type &v, dirs_map) {
00202       if (!v.second) {
00203         HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removing directory %s", v.first);
00204 
00205         if (!m_dryrun) {
00206           try {
00207             m_fs->rmdir(v.first);
00208             ++nd_done;
00209           }
00210           catch (Exception &e) {
00211             HT_ERRORF("%s", e.what());
00212           }
00213         }
00214         ++nd;
00215       }
00216     }
00217 
00218     HT_DEBUGF("MasterGc: removed %lu/%lu files; %lu/%lu directories",
00219               (Lu)nf_done, (Lu)nf, (Lu)nd_done, (Lu)nd);
00220   }
00221 
00222   void
00223   gc() {
00224     try {
00225       CountMap files_map;
00226       scan_metadata(files_map);
00227       // TODO: scan_directories(files_map); // fsckish, slower
00228       reap(files_map);
00229     }
00230     catch (Exception &e) {
00231       HT_ERRORF("Error: caught exception while gc'ing: %s", e.what());
00232     }
00233   }
00234 
00235   void
00236   operator()() {
00237     do {
00238       int remain = sleep(m_interval);
00239 
00240       if (remain)
00241         break; // interrupted
00242 
00243       if (m_metadata) gc();
00244       else HT_INFOF("MasterGc: METADATA not ready, will try again in "
00245                     "%d seconds", m_interval);
00246 
00247     } while (true);
00248   }
00249 };
00250 
00251 } // local namespace

00253 namespace Hypertable {
00254 
00255 void
00256 master_gc_start(PropertiesPtr props, ThreadGroup &threads,
00257                 TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs) {
00258   int interval = props->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Gc.Interval", 300);
00259 
00260   threads.create_thread(GcWorker(metadata, fs, interval));
00261 
00262   HT_INFOF("Started table file garbage collection thread with interval: "
00263            "%d seconds", interval);
00264 }
00265 
00266 void
00267 master_gc_once(TablePtr &metadata, Filesystem *fs, bool dryrun) {
00268   GcWorker worker(metadata, fs, 0, dryrun);
00269   worker.gc();
00270 }
00271 
00272 } // namespace Hypertable
